sentence.Network_en: The crowds had been soaked and were now nicely drying out.
sentence.Network_cn: 这群人都浑身湿透，现在谢天谢地快晾干了。

sentence.Network_en: He's just written a book, nicely illustrated and not too technical.
sentence.Network_cn: 他刚写完一本书，插图精美，内容也并不艰涩。

sentence.Network_en: She has a bit of private money, so they manage quite nicely.
sentence.Network_cn: 她有一点私房钱，所以他们过得很舒心。

entry.def: If something is happening or working nicely, it is happening or working in a satisfactory way or in the way that you want it to.

example.ex: She has a bit of private money, so they manage quite nicely...
example.tran: 她有一点私房钱，所以他们过得很舒心。

example.ex: The crowds had been soaked and were now nicely drying out.
example.tran: 这群人都浑身湿透，现在谢天谢地快晾干了。

entry.def: If someone or something is doing nicely, they are being successful.

example.ex: ...another hotel owner who is doing very nicely.
example.tran: 又一个成功的酒店老板

entry.def: If you say that something will do nicely, you mean that it is good enough for the situation.

example.ex: A shirt and jersey and an ordinary pair of trousers will do nicely, thank you...
example.tran: 一件衬衫和毛衣，再加一条普通的裤子就很不错，谢谢你。

example.ex: A quick nod of approval would have done nicely.
example.tran: 要是当时立即点头同意就好了。

auth_sentence.content: In most parks, grass is kept nicely mowed.

auth_sentence.content: But, it would explain the French very nicely.
auth_sentence.res_content: But, it would explain the French very nicely.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But, it would explain the French very nicely.

auth_sentence.content: I thought that summed up the issue quite nicely.
auth_sentence.res_content: I thought that summed up the issue quite nicely.

Sentence.sentence: En… She did look very neat, very nicely dressed, but… W: But so shy

sentences.en: The injured man is doing nicely in hospital.
sentences.cn: 这个受伤者在医院恢复得良好。

sentences.en: Her new business is doing very nicely.
Tomorrow at ten will do nicely (= will be a good time).
